title: Wave.video
description:
Dream video marketing tools in one place and 100% cloud-based? Yes! 
Create stunning videos, share, and drive results! 👉
For the price of one, you get: intuitive and powerful live streaming software, a video editor with cool features, video hosting to store, host, embed, and distribute your videos, a thumbnail maker, converters, and many more! Try it today for free.🥳
